verses.text: In the \w seventeenth|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.

\w Twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* not \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, like \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

But he \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, yea, and made his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, according to the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cast \w out|strong="H3423"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* and burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* in the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and on the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, and under every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*.

¶ Then \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* and \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: and they \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*, but \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w overcome|strong="H3898"\w* \add him\add*.

At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w recovered|strong="H7725"\w* \w Elath|strong="H0359"\w* to \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, and \w drave|strong="H5394"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* from \w Elath|strong="H0359"\w*: and the \w Syrians|strong="H0726"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Elath|strong="H0359"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* there unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 16.6 \ft from Elath: Heb. from Eloth\f*

So \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w Tiglath-pileser|strong="H8407"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* and thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me out of the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, and out of the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me.

And \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* that was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and in the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \add it for\add* a \w present|strong="H7810"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto him: for the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and \w took|strong="H8610"\w* it, and carried \add the people of\add* it \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* to \w Kir|strong="H7024"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w*.\f + \fr 16.9 \ft Damascus: Heb. Dammesek\f*

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Tiglath-pileser|strong="H8407"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* that \add was\add* at \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*: and \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* the \w fashion|strong="H1823"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and the \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w* of it, according to all the \w workmanship|strong="H4639"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 16.10 \ft Damascus: Heb. Dammesek\f*

And \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* according to all that \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* from \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*: so \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* against \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*.

And when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w approached|strong="H7126"\w* to the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* thereon.

And he \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* his burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w poured|strong="H5258"\w* his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*, and \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of his peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.\f + \fr 16.13 \ft his peace offerings: Heb. the peace offerings which were his\f*

And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* also the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, which \add was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, from the \w forefront|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, from between the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* it on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H3409"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Upon the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*, and his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, with the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*; and \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* upon it all the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and all the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*: and the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* shall be for me to \w enquire|strong="H1239"\w* \add by\add*.
Thus \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, according to all that \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* cut \w off|strong="H7112"\w* the \w borders|strong="H4526"\w* of the \w bases|strong="H4350"\w*, and \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* from off them; and took \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* from off the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* that \add were\add* under it, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* it upon a \w pavement|strong="H4837"\w* of \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*.

And the \w covert|strong="H4329"\w* for the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* that they had \w built|strong="H1129"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w entry|strong="H3996"\w* \w without|strong="H2435"\w*, \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* he from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

¶ Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

And \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.
